programme.title: New York society
programme.short_synopsis: Social change in America and the continual cycles of New York's 'high society'.
programme.medium_synopsis: Class mobility and social change in New York are illustrated by Alistair Cooke with the stories of the Astors, the Metropolitan Opera House, JP Morgan and Mrs Stuyvesant Fish.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
